record.description: Time and GPS coordinates (as floats), with RSSI optional (but desired). src_file also optional.
record.$comment: I don't know how to syntactically specify that std_optional_fields->time is required, so I just put all those fields at the top level here.

lat.description: Latitude as floating point number. E.g. 38.9612369.

lon.description: Longitude as floating point number. E.g. -76.835567.
